description:
Meet the Hecto Drive 500XL: a compact, durable cycling light with 500 lumens of brightness, versatile lighting modes, and up to 20 hours of runtime. It's designed for your safety, easily straps to your handlebars, and keeps you visible on the road, day or night. Whether you're navigating bustling city streets during rush hour or exploring tranquil countryside roads at dusk, this light ensures you’re ready to go no matter the light outside.

  • 8 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 5 in flashing; steady: 500 lumens (1h), 200 lumens (2h), 100 lumens (4h), flash 1–50 lumens (13.5h), flash 2–15 lumens (20h), pulse flash 1–50 lumens (15h), and day flash–500 lumens (5.45h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of the light’s LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Integrated USB plug on the front light means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Hecto Drive 500XL Front Light
